  "description": "Brenhazy Limited is a privately owned Nigerian company incorporated in 2014 to provide Manpower Services, Engineering, Procurement, and Construction (EPC) services to companies in line with standard requirements and global best practices.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Procurement and Logistics Officer

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos&nbsp;
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	A highly organized and detail-oriented Logistics / Procurement Officer to manage our company&#39;s Logistics and Procurement processes and supply chain activities.
	The Logistics / Procurement Officer will be responsible for overseeing the planning, coordination, and execution of the receipt, transportation, storage, and distribution of goods and materials within the organization, ensuring efficient supply chain management and timely delivery to clients.


Responsibilities


	Assesses and organizes logistgics in terms of transport requirements.
	In cooperation with SMS, prepare receipts for international shipments and liase with component authorities for tax Exemption, port clearances, etc.
	Carries out regular trips to ensure that materials forwarded has been received and properly accounted for at their destination and in case of loss or damange, follow up with the clearing agents, shipping and insurance companies in liaison with SMS.
	Devices methods of stock control, closely monitor wahrehousing management and regularly submit situation reports on stocks, equipments and goods.
	Identifying and evaluating suppliers.
	Arranging for transportation of purchased goods.
	Identifying and developing strategies for addressing logistical barriers.
	Monitoring use of materials and resources.
	Ensuring quality record keeping.
	Reviewing, comparing, analyzing, and approving products and services to be purchased.
	Managing inventories and maintaining accurate purchase and pricing records
	Maintaining and updating supplier information such as qualifications, delivery times, product ranges, etc.
	Maintaining good supplier relations and negotiating contracts.
	Managing all Logistics and Procurement project and assisting with processing service contracts, leases and rental agreements.
	Coordinating logistics and travel arrangements.
	Supporting project trainings, workshops, meetings and surveys in the field in full compliance with policies and procedures.
	Providing logistics support in the areas of inventory, surveying, and projecting.
	Ordering and pre-staging equipment for deployment.
	Logistics planning, transportation, and storage.
	Overseeing the organization, planning, and maintenance of the fleet Base level procurement, storage, inventory, distribution, equipment and facilities maintenance, fleet management, filing and archiving
	Serving as point of contact on any Logistics matters at the Base and contributing to the implementation of Logistics policies.


Requirements


	Bachelors Degree in Supply chain management, Business Administration or any related field.
	4 - 5 years work experience.


Skills:


	Proficiency in Microsoft Office and purchasing software.
	Strong negotiation skills, analytical thinking, and the ability to work collaboratively with internal and external stakeholders.
	Strong communication and negotiation skills.
	Knowledge of business.
	Basic mathematics.
	Leadership skills.
	Analytical skills.
	Attention to detail.
	Team playing skill.


Remuneration


	N300,000 -&nbsp;N350,000 / Month.
	Remuneration is dependent on qualification and proven experience.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;recruitment@brenhazy.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Procurement and Logistics Officer Job at Brenhazy Limited




        
    

        
        Brenhazy Limited is a privately owned Nigerian company incorporated in 2014 to provide Manpower Services, Engineering, Procurement, and Construction (EPC) services to companies in line with standard requirements and global best practices.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Procurement and Logistics Officer

Job Location: Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

            
    




	A highly organized and detail-oriented Logistics / Procurement Officer to manage our company's Logistics and Procurement processes and supply chain activities.
	The Logistics / Procurement Officer will be responsible for overseeing the planning, coordination, and execution of the receipt, transportation, storage, and distribution of goods and materials within the organization, ensuring efficient supply chain management and timely delivery to clients.


Responsibilities


	Assesses and organizes logistgics in terms of transport requirements.
	In cooperation with SMS, prepare receipts for international shipments and liase with component authorities for tax Exemption, port clearances, etc.
	Carries out regular trips to ensure that materials forwarded has been received and properly accounted for at their destination and in case of loss or damange, follow up with the clearing agents, shipping and insurance companies in liaison with SMS.
	Devices methods of stock control, closely monitor wahrehousing management and regularly submit situation reports on stocks, equipments and goods.
	Identifying and evaluating suppliers.
	Arranging for transportation of purchased goods.
	Identifying and developing strategies for addressing logistical barriers.
	Monitoring use of materials and resources.
	Ensuring quality record keeping.
	Reviewing, comparing, analyzing, and approving products and services to be purchased.
	Managing inventories and maintaining accurate purchase and pricing records
	Maintaining and updating supplier information such as qualifications, delivery times, product ranges, etc.
	Maintaining good supplier relations and negotiating contracts.
	Managing all Logistics and Procurement project and assisting with processing service contracts, leases and rental agreements.
	Coordinating logistics and travel arrangements.
	Supporting project trainings, workshops, meetings and surveys in the field in full compliance with policies and procedures.
	Providing logistics support in the areas of inventory, surveying, and projecting.
	Ordering and pre-staging equipment for deployment.
	Logistics planning, transportation, and storage.
	Overseeing the organization, planning, and maintenance of the fleet Base level procurement, storage, inventory, distribution, equipment and facilities maintenance, fleet management, filing and archiving
	Serving as point of contact on any Logistics matters at the Base and contributing to the implementation of Logistics policies.


Requirements


	Bachelors Degree in Supply chain management, Business Administration or any related field.
	4 - 5 years work experience.


Skills:


	Proficiency in Microsoft Office and purchasing software.
	Strong negotiation skills, analytical thinking, and the ability to work collaboratively with internal and external stakeholders.
	Strong communication and negotiation skills.
	Knowledge of business.
	Basic mathematics.
	Leadership skills.
	Analytical skills.
	Attention to detail.
	Team playing skill.


Remuneration


	N300,000 - N350,000 / Month.
	Remuneration is dependent on qualification and proven experience.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruitment@brenhazy.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: Candidates residing around Ajah axis are preferred.

Human Resource Business Partner Job at Human Edge Dimension Consulting




        
    

        
        Human Edge Dimension Consulting is a modern HR consulting firm dedicated to helping startups, small businesses, and growing enterprises build strong human capital foundations. Founded in 2022, our company was born out of a clear need: to make expert-level HR support accessible, affordable, and impactful for businesses in their early growth stages.

We bring a fresh, innovative perspective to HR strategy—combining legal compliance with people-first practices. Whether you're hiring your first employee or restructuring a growing team, we deliver flexible solutions that evolve with your business.
     

            
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Human Resource Business Partner
Job Location: Lagos Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Work hours: 8:00 AM – 5:00 PM, Monday to Saturday.

Job Summary


	An experienced and seasoned HRBP with experience working in international logistics, international trade company, banking or insurance institions. The HRBP must have vast experience in recruting and managing sales people.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess a B.Sc Degree with 4 - 6 years of work experience.


Salary


	N400,000 - N450,000 per month (depending on experience). 
	Paid time off, including vacation and sick leave.
	Regular team-building activities and an end-of-year gift.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their updated CV to: humanedgeconsulting02@gmail.com using "Human Resource Business Partner" as the subject of the mail.
